remarks: Define the set of all lines.  A line is an infinite subset of ` RR3 ` that satisfies a ` PtDf ` property.  (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 15-Jul-2012.)
statement:
df-line3 $p |- line3 = { x e. ~P RR3 | ( 2o ~<_ x /\ A. y e. x A. z e. x ( z =/= y -> ran PtDf ( y , z ) = x ) ) } $.
$d x y z $.
